name: talky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having or involving a lot of talk: It's a very talky film with almost no action. Apart from his performance, the play seems talky and pretentious. Compare
long-winded
wordy
old-fashioned talking a lot or too much: The villain is a talky chump. She is very talky and full of herself. Synonyms
chatty
talkative
More examplesFewer examplesThis is a talky play.There are lots of talky scenes in between the action that could have been cut.The talky sequences are in the second half of the film.His films are talky, smart, and slow.
